= Introduction to Rabbit =

Routing Automation of Breadboard Integreated Tool, or *Rabbit*, is an open source tool for PCB developers to implement their design easily on a breadboard for before-PCB test and design. Its goal is to read netlists from design tools such as Orcad and Protel and then automatically place and route the design on a given breadboard. It was first developed by students from Fudan University Shanghai China. It is a project under the school's Science Innovation Program, and other kind donations are warmly welcomed.
